thread.title: Google Calendar is getting a new URL for security reasons
thread.title_full: Google Calendar is getting a new URL for security reasons - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Google Calendar is getting a new URL for security reasons
text: Google Calendar is used by many people to track (seemingly) their every activity. That's a good thing, as it keeps users organized and calendars can be shared with family and co-workers so they also know what's going on. But what about its security? It doesn't seem a huge issue, given the nature of the service -- it isn't your bank, after all. Google is ever vigilant, however, and has been thinking this part through and is now making some changes. The update brings a new URL, but it's really about security. "In an effort to further increase security, in the… [Continue Reading] »
